disabled.description: Disabled buttons cannot be interacted with and have no visual interaction effect.

onIcon.description: Icon to display when on is true.

offIcon.description: Icon to display when on is false.

ariaLabelOn.description: aria-label of the button when on is true. If set, ariaLabelOff must also be set.

ariaLabelOff.description: aria-label of the button when on is false. If set, ariaLabelOn must also be set.
